ENGLISH: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 47/135, The Declaration on the Rights of Persons Belonging to National or Ethnic, Religious and Linguistic Minorities.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 47/135, The Declaration on the Rights of Persons Belonging to National or Ethnic, Religious and Linguistic Minorities, has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 47/135, The Declaration on the Rights of Persons Belonging to National or Ethnic, Religious and Linguistic Minorities, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 47/135, The Declaration on the Rights of Persons Belonging to National or Ethnic, Religious and Linguistic Minorities, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Vote on Minority Rights Declaration

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 47/135, The Declaration on the Rights of Persons Belonging to National or Ethnic, Religious and Linguistic Minorities.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
